title: Friends,
text:
Weâ€™re only 70 new Sustainers away from meeting our goal of 400 Sustainers by Shavuot! Thank you to all who have already signed up to make a monthly donation, and to all who support Sefaria in any way that they can.
Please become a Sustainer today to help Sefaria continue expanding access to the Jewish canon and transforming your learning experience. We need and value your support.
Chag Shavuot Sameach,
Team Sefaria
